net.kuujo.copycat.util.concurrent

Class SingleThreadContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kuujo.copycat.util.concurrent.Context
      • net.kuujo.copycat.util.concurrent.SingleThreadContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Executor

    public class SingleThreadContext
extends Context
    Single threaded context.

    This is a basic Context implementation that uses a ScheduledExecutorService to schedule events on the context thread.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Constructor Detail

      • SingleThreadContext

        public SingleThreadContext(String name,
                           net.kuujo.alleycat.Alleycat serializer)
        Creates a new single thread context.

        The provided context name will be passed to CopycatThreadFactory and used when instantiating the context thread.

        Parameters:
        name - The context name.
        serializer - The context serializer.

      • SingleThreadContext

        public SingleThreadContext(ScheduledExecutorService executor,
                           net.kuujo.alleycat.Alleycat serializer)
        Creates a new single thread context.
        Parameters:
        executor - The executor on which to schedule events. This must be a single thread scheduled executor.
        serializer - The context serializer.

      • SingleThreadContext
